King Diamond

Danish occult rocker who first rose to prominence as a member of gothic black metal group Mercyful Fate before launching a solo career in 1986.

Read Full Biography

STREAM OR BUY:

Active

1970s - 2020s

Born

June 14, 1956 in Copenhagen, Denmark

Genre

Pop/Rock

Styles

Heavy Metal, Progressive Metal, Neo-Classical Metal, Black Metal

Also Known As

Kim Bendix Petersen

Member Of

Mercyful Fate
